title: The King Tingaling Painting
description:
alternate cover for B00KIWJEW0
THE SEQUEL TO DUKE & MICHEL: THE MYSTERIOUS CORRIDOR
'IMAGINATIVE, EXCITING AND MAGICAL!'
DUKE & MICHEL: THE KING TINGALING PAINTING
Duke & Michel must rescue Michel’s family and Duke’s Premium Nibbles from the villainous Master but end up becoming pawns in a battle between the Master and King Tingaling, who is still royally riled over a portrait of him in a compromising position with a pineapple, a wad of cash and his favourite pig - Buttercup.Follow Duke & Michel as they go to and fro between Painters' Planet No.2 and The Royal Globe, where they meet Boris the Rat!
author: Elias Zapple
